name: Fallen Devotion
storyline:
Three years have passed since your childhood best friend's death. Three years of trying to move on, of trying to forget the misunderstandings, guilt eating you up to the point you couldn't show up to his funeral.

It all started with nightmares so vivid they left you breathless, then the strange signs, from the feeling of being watched to the weight of a presence you couldn't explain.

Everywhere you turn memories of him cling to you, refusing to let go.

One thing is clear though, Clive is back and something about him has changed;

His love for you, once warm and pure, now feels as sharp as a blade.

Every choice pulls you deeper into the waters of grief, longing and the lengths someone would go for a second chance.
summary:
Fallen devotion is more than just a story- it's a reflection of existential dread, guilt, and human desire for redemption.

In which, your supposedly deceased childhood best friend has somehow come back, but something about him is different now.
